title: Prisma
body: Learning how to use Prisma ORM with Node.js and PostgreSQL.

title: Next.js Integration
body: Integrating Prisma with Next.js for server-side data fetching.

title: Database Migration
body: Running Prisma migrations to update the database schema.

title: Prisma Studio
body: Using Prisma Studio to view and manage database records visually.

title: Seeding Data
body: Creating a Prisma seed script to populate sample data automatically.

title: Schema Modeling
body: Defining models in Prisma schema to represent database tables.

title: Relations
body: Understanding one-to-many and many-to-many relations in Prisma.

title: CRUD Operations
body: Implementing Create, Read, Update, and Delete using Prisma Client.

title: Error Handling
body: Catching and managing database errors gracefully with Prisma.

title: Deployment
body: Deploying Prisma with production-ready PostgreSQL database.
